resources.string: This application reads and writes data from/to an Mifare Classic 1K NFC tag.

There are 5 icons to click on:
1 home = this page
2 read data
3 read encr = read encrypted data
4 write data
5 write encr = write an encrypted data
This app works with a Mifare Classic 1K tag for reading
This example expects a Mifare Classic 1K type tag. The tag should use only the well known keys A and B for authentication.\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This app reads an encrypted NDEF message
This example expects a class 4 type tag with an encrypted NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This app works with a Mifare Classic 1K tag for writing
This example writes data to a sector on a Mifare Classic 1K tag
If an encryption dataset is found the data is displayed as well and you can enter a passphrase to decrypt the data.
This app works with a Mifare Classic 1K tag for writing a Value Block
This app works with a Mifare Classic 1K tag for reading all Value Blocks on the tag
